title: Steel Balls & Stilettos
description: He was a warrior.As a Navy SEAL, Chaz Carrington knew exactly how to win against any adversary, under any conditions.To never accept defeat.Especially when it came to the most important mission of his life; winning the heart of the woman he loved.Doctor Jenna McBride was as necessary to his survival as the air he breathed.Always had been, always would be.When his secrets were revealed, there was absolutely nothing that he wouldn't do, or hadn't done, to make her his.They called him Steel, and love was his battlefieldâ€¦Forged Steel is a complete story with HEA and no cliffhangers, BUT there is a sub-plot that continues through the entire series!Please note: this book contains mature content and graphic violence.
author: Tonya Brooks
